Name: Steep Flight
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
22.5 ml Belle de Brillet pear liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of apple or pear wedge.
Garnish with apple or pear wedge.
Review: "Apples and pears" is the cockney rhyming slang for stairs, hence the flavours in this flight.
History: Created in 2005 by yours truly. Incredibly, this cocktail was awarded a Gold in the Long Drink category at the Drinks International Bartender's Challenge on 31st May 2006.
Nutrition: One serving of Steep Flight contains 192 calories
